text: Ronald or Ron Evans may mean: * Ronald Evans (astronaut) (1933–1990), American naval officer and astronaut * Ronald Evans (rugby league) (1933–2010), English rugby league footballer * Ronald M. Evans (born 1949), American professor and biologist * Ron Evans (1939–2007), Australian rules footballer and executive * Ron J. Evans (1926–2004), Australian rules footballer * Ron Evans (politician) (born 1957), clergyman and politician in Manitoba, Canada * Ron Evans (cricketer) (1922–1993), English cricketer
title: Ronald Evans
